CustomFieldTranslation.name: ChunkSize_Contact_SoftCredit__c
CustomFieldTranslation.help: FOR LDV ORGS ONLY WITH SFDO GUIDANCE. To avoid a Query Timeout in the rollup batch job in orgs with many millions of Contacts, this specifies the maximum number of Contacts processed in each batch.
CustomFieldTranslation.label: LDV: Contact Soft Credit Chunk Size
